segments.text: Welcome to Youth Travel Agency . Is there anything I can do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We'd like to look around the town . Can you tell me the best sightseeing route to take ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why not come here and have a look at the guidebook ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think this route is quite interesting . How long does the tour last ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me see . It's a one day tour .
segments.speaker: S1
